author: Louis Rossmann
description:
# Let's Investigate stream 

## What is this?

"let's play" gaming streams seemed like a crazy idea in 1999 but became very popular. I want to try a new interactive format: "Let's Investigate", live  research & documentation of consumer rights/anti-ownership violations.

## How this works!

### The current process
- Louis researches anti-ownership & consumer exploitation issues
- Louis documents findings on [consumerrights.wiki](https://consumerrights.wiki) 
- Louis uses these wiki articles to make YouTube videos exposing anti-ownership company misconduct

### The new process
Instead of researching & writing by myself, I will write wiki articles on livestream, encouraging people to pipe in with good sources & insights to make the article better. 

## Today's case is ***Futurehome***

https://www.futurehome.io/en_no/
https://support.futurehome.no/hc/en-no/articles/28158944965277-FAQ-Subscription
https://www.reddit.com/r/norge/comments/1lek0p7/futurehome_tvinger_eksisterende_kunder_over
title: let's investigate anti ownership companies together
